tool_description: Build full-length, SEO-ready articles or blogs, in under a minute.
name: Byword Article Generation
title: Byword Article Generation

api_list.name: Write Article From Title
api_list.description: Input the title of an article that you'd like written, and this endpoint will return a fully written, HTML-formatted article.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: Input the title of an article that you'd like written, and this endpoint will return a fully written, HTML-formatted article with that title.
required_parameters.default: How To Write A Business Plan

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Enter the language that your keyword is in, and that you'd like your article to be generated in.

api_list.name: Write Article From Keyword
api_list.description: Input a keyword that you'd like to rank for on SEO/organic search, and this endpoint will return a fully written article which can rank for that keyword. A keyword can be multiple words long (e.g. 'how to get rid of cold').

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: Enter the keyword that you want to rank for, and the API will generate an article which can rank for that keyword. A keyword can contain multiple words, e.g. 'how change car engine oil'.
required_parameters.default: how to get rid of cold

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: Enter the language that your keyword is in, and that you'd like your article to be generated in.
